protein.specific_function: Can degrade fibronectin, gelatins of type I, III, IV, and V; weakly collagens III, IV, and V. Activates procollagenase

go_class.description: peptidase activity, acting on l-amino acid peptides

reference.reference_text: Muller D, Quantin B, Gesnel MC, Millon-Collard R, Abecassis J, Breathnach R: The collagenase gene family in humans consists of at least four members. Biochem J. 1988 Jul 1;253(1):187-92.
